data.text:
In November 2005, Judith Martin was awarded the National Humanities Medal:

“The President of the United States awards this National Humanities Medal to Judith Martin for helping to convey the importance of etiquette and good manners with wit and wisdom. She has advised millions on how to treat others with dignity and respect.”
